snippet: A ruling cites a lack of proof that an 89-year-old former SS gunner participated in the 1944 killings at Oradour-sur-Glane, France.
abstract: Court in Cologne, Germany, rules there is lack of proof to try 89-year-old former SS gunner Werner Christukat with participating in 1944 Nazi massacre of 642 people in French village.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: A ruling cites a lack of proof that an 89-year-old former SS gunner participated in the 1944 killings at Oradour-sur-Glane, France.

headline.main: German Court Finds Lack of Proof Tying Ex-Soldier to Nazi Massacre
headline.print_headline: German Court Finds Lack of Proof Tying Ex-Soldier to Nazi Massacre

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
